mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GROUP_USER (user_id, group_id, group_role, group_state) VALUES (#{userId}, #{groupId}, #{groupRole}, #{groupState})
mapper.select: SELECT ID, NAME, PROFILE AS groupImageUrl, CREATED_DATE AS createdDate, UPDATED_DATE AS updatedDate FROM GROUP_ WHERE ID = #{groupId}

SELECT USER_ID AS userId, GROUP_ID AS groupId, GROUP_ROLE AS groupRole, GROUP_STATE AS groupState, CREATED_DATE AS createdDate, UPDATED_DATE AS updatedDate FROM GROUP_USER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND GROUP_ID = #{groupId}

SELECT g.ID AS groupId, g.NAME AS groupName, g.PROFILE AS groupImageUrl, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM GROUP_USER gu_sub WHERE gu_sub.GROUP_ID = g.ID AND gu_sub.GROUP_STATE = 1) AS participant FROM GROUP_ g WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM GROUP_USER gu WHERE gu.USER_ID = #{userId} AND gu.GROUP_ID = g.ID AND gu.GROUP_STATE = 1)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM GROUP_USER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND GROUP_ID = #{groupId}
DELETE FROM GROUP_SCHEDULE_UNREGISTERED_PARTICIPANT WHERE GROUP_SCHEDULE_ID IN (SELECT ID FROM GROUP_SCHEDULE WHERE GROUP_ID = #{groupId})
mapper.select: SELECT g.ID AS groupId, g.NAME AS groupName, g.PROFILE AS groupImageUrl FROM GROUP_USER gu JOIN GROUP_ g ON gu.GROUP_ID = g.ID WHERE gu.USER_ID = #{userId} AND (gu.GROUP_STATE = 0 OR gu.GROUP_STATE IS NULL)
SELECT u.name, u.username, u.profile_img_url as profileImage, g.group_role as groupRole FROM GROUP_USER as g JOIN USER as u ON g.user_id = u.id WHERE g.group_id = #{groupId} AND g.GROUP_STATE = 1;
